description: Try our easy to follow Rustic Smokey Eggplant Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Veggie dip,Pescatarian,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Rustic Smokey Eggplant Dip Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook eggplants and capsicums on a barbecue grill or over a gas flame until they are completely blackened. Set eggplant aside until cool enough to handle and place capsicum into a bowl and cover with plastic.

Peel the blackened skin from the capsicum and discard seeds. Roughly chop and set aside. Halve eggplants and using a large spoon, scoop flesh into a strainer over a bowl. Discard skin. Chop flesh into pieces. Add to bowl with capsicum and mix together gently.

Reserve a few sprigs of parsley and roughly chop remainder. Add chopped parsley, garlic, oil, lemon juice, all spice and salt and pepper and combine gently. Spoon into a serving bowl and top with reserved parsley.
